table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));

table.name: vte_calendarhorizontal_user_profiles
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_calendarhorizontal_user_profiles` ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(19) NOT NULL, `params` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
